IT Support+Information Technology (IT)+S.EXPLANATION: The amount of time that integration systems are unavailable.
IT Support+Information Technology (IT)+S.FORMULA: Total Downtime Due to Integration Issues / Total Scheduled Integration Time

IT Support+Information Technology (IT)+S.EXPLANATION: The speed at which data is transferred across systems.
IT Support+Information Technology (IT)+S.FORMULA: Total Amount of Data Transferred / Total Time for Transfer

IT Support+Information Technology (IT)+S.EXPLANATION: The percentage of successful integrations versus total integration attempts.
IT Support+Information Technology (IT)+S.FORMULA: (Number of Successful Integrations / Total Integrations Attempted) * 100

IT Support+Information Technology (IT)+S.EXPLANATION: Measures how well the system works with different platforms or software.
IT Support+Information Technology (IT)+S.FORMULA: (Number of Compatible Systems / Total Systems Tested) * 100

IT Support+Information Technology (IT)+S.EXPLANATION: The time taken to complete an integration from start to finish.
IT Support+Information Technology (IT)+S.FORMULA: Total Time for Integration Process / Number of Integrations

IT Support+Information Technology (IT)+S.EXPLANATION: The percentage of errors that occur during data transfers.
IT Support+Information Technology (IT)+S.FORMULA: (Number of Errors in Data Transfers / Total Data Transfers) * 100

IT Support+Information Technology (IT)+S.EXPLANATION: The time it takes for the system to respond to a request.
IT Support+Information Technology (IT)+S.FORMULA: Average Time Taken for System to Respond to Requests

IT Support+Information Technology (IT)+S.EXPLANATION: The percentage of users who start using a new system or feature.
IT Support+Information Technology (IT)+S.FORMULA: (Number of Users Adopting the System / Total Number of Target Users) * 100
